name: Doughnut City
description:
Mediatonic & SideQuest Game Jam.

Theme: One Room

One 'Space that can be occupied' is 'Doughnut City'. A delicious city, packed full of yummy foods.

Legend says that, amongst the countless cakes, cookies & croissants that cover the city, there are 5 special doughnuts hidden around the city.

It's rumoured that if someone could bring all 5 doughnuts to the centre of the city that they would get an unlimited supply of doughnuts for the rest of their lives.

Capture all 5 doughnuts before the timer runs out to win.

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement

Space = Jump

Esc = Main Menu
